# CameraRegionAnchor.CameraEnhancement

**Enumeration**

Enhancements to be used with each anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CameraEnhancement
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CameraRegionAnchor.CameraEnhancement.contrastAndVibrancy**: Contrast and vibrancy enhancement in addition to simple crop/zoom.
- **CameraRegionAnchor.CameraEnhancement.stabilization**: Simple crop/zoom.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of the camera enhancement.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
